# Build_pdf function

## 1. Brief Description

The `build_pdf()` function allows users to create a PDF document from an R Markdown file. This makes it possible to easily produce documents when using R Markdown that can be shared and viewed outside of R Studio.

## 2. What Package Contains it 

The `build_pdf()` function is part of the `rmarkdown` package. This package can be installed using the `install.packages()` function or by searching for it through the R Studio built-in package
